haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Obltn Oswald Fromm
Ltn Joachim Lechner

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 12/10/1916 near Ressons.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 32 Squadron RFC was brought down by Joachim Lechner of Jasta 16b.
Charles Stepney was not injured.
Joachim Lechner was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 12/10/1916 near Ferrieres.
A Caquot was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 12/10/1916 near Ressons.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 32 Squadron RFC was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Montgomery Wyard was killed in action.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 12/10/1916 near Pont-A-Mousson.
A F.E.2b of Esc 34 was brought down by Nikolaus Schildhauer of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Jean-Francois Gisquet was killed in action.
S/Lt Anton de Anchald was killed in action.
Nikolaus Schildhauer was  flying a Albatros D.II.


Pilots lost were: 
    Obltn Oswald Fromm: Killed in Action
